title.rendered: REGISTER NOW: Team Science Training 6/2 and 6/9

content.rendered:
Dear RADx-rad DCC Awardees, teams, Program Officers, and DCC members,

Registration for Team Science Training facilitated by Dr. Danny Kim is now open.

  • Team Science Training consists of two-90 minute sessions scheduled on Thursdays, June 2 and June 9 from 9:30am-11am Pacific Time.
  • Sign up in teams of three or more or individually, and grouped within the RADx-rad community.
  • This opportunity is open to all RADx-rad consortium members and staff.
  • Training includes a CliftonStrengths assessment to identify your strengths and natural talents.*

*Assessment and Training Sessions Zoom link will be provided upon registration.

Link to Registration: https://forms.gle/1XBW1BigMPS8B3Dm7

Deadline: Wednesday May 18th.     

If you have any questions or concerns, email: radx-rad-admin@ucsd.edu. For additional information, please see the attached flyer: TeamScienceTraining_DannyKim.

Thank you.

 

-RADx-rad DCC Admin Team
